amendatorysection.catchline: Health clinic; medical care organization or association; peer review committee authorized.
amendatorysection.para: Any health clinic as defined in section 71-416 and any other organization or association of health practitioners or providers licensed pursuant to the Uniform Credentialing Act may cause a peer review committee to be formed and operated or may contract with an outside peer review committee for the purpose of reviewing, from time to time, the medical care provided by such health clinic, organization, or association and for assisting individual practitioners or providers practicing in such clinics, organizations, or associations in maintaining and providing a high standard of medical care.
